purpose: The email announces an open postdoctoral researcher position in Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems at KU Leuven, Belgium. It provides details about the research group's focus on Blockchain and Local-first Software, the qualifications required for candidates, and the benefits of the position. The email encourages interested candidates to apply and provides links for more information.
evidence_sentences: The DistriNet research group at KU Leuven University in Belgium has an open position for a Post-doc researcher in Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems.
Our mission? To empower our industry partners with the knowledge and tools to create better, more scalable, and more secure and sovereign decentralized applications.
We are looking for a post-doc researcher with prior research experience and published results in the areas of Distributed Systems, Blockchain, Cloud or Web.
A full-time salaried position as post-doc researcher (fixed-term contract with the outlook for a multi-year engagement).
Shortlisted candidates will be interviewed on a rolling basis.
